医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新的疟疾控制策略针对蚊子中的蛋白质系统根据约翰·霍普金斯·彭博公共卫生学院的研究人员领导的一项研究，蚊子蚊子中的分子质量控制系统是负责世界大多数疟疾病例的物种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-malaria-controll-strategy-targets-protein-system-system-system-system-system-mosquitoes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-malaria-control-strategy-trategy-targets-protein-system-system-system-system-mosquitoes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01B11024-6578-40C5-A62F-DFD8D8D8C676B8 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:54:01 -0400 New malaria control strategy targets protein system in mosquitoes
新的移动应用程序有助于恢复中风后的偏瘫巴西研究人员开发了一种手机应用程序，该应用程序有助于康复遭受中风的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-mobile-app-aids-in-rehabilitating-hemiparesis-following-stroke-stroke-stroke.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-mobile-app-aids-in-rehabilitating-hemiparesis-following-stroke-stroke-stroke.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb144cba-AA5D-4573-A218-6456B38AB117 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:48:45 -0400 New mobile app aids in rehabilitating hemiparesis following stroke
COVID-19大流行在欧洲造成了无残障生命的重大丧失Among 289 million adults in 18 European countries, more than 16 million years of life were lost from 2020 through 2022 due to the COVID-19 pandemic, according to a new study published March 11th in the open-access journal PLOS Medicine by Sara Ahmadi-Abhari of Imperial College London, UK, and colleagues. https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/covid-19-pandemic-caused-simendificant-loss-loss-loss-loss-fies-free-life-life-in-europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/covid-19-pandemic-caused-simendificant-loss-loss-loss-loss-fies-free-life-life-in-europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=BB8F5C37-0F48-4BE3-84CC-76F2A2E1A365 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:37:45 -0400 COVID-19 pandemic caused significant loss of disability-free life in Europe
新方法表明有望发现潜在的败血症治疗免疫系统通常可以提高人体的防御能力，以清除入侵的威胁而没有问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-apphack-shows-promise-promise-promise-promise-pover-potential-sepsis-sepsis-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-apphack-shows-promise-promise-formise-pover-potential-sepsis-sepsis-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA3750CC-FC21-446E-B920-4357F39E7F7F Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:33:20 -0400 New approach shows promise for uncovering potential sepsis treatments
Tirzepatide帮助没有糖尿病的人在现实世界中减轻体重13％一项针对4,000多名没有2型糖尿病的美国患者的现实研究发现，那些持续使用Tirzepatide至少六个月的患者平均损失了其体重的12.9％。这项研究强调了提尔齐甲基在正式的FDA批准以减轻体重之前，是一种有效的标签外肥胖治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/tirzepatide-helps-people-without-diabetes-diabetes-lose-1325-body-weight-weight-weight-real-real-real-inleal-world-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/tirzepatide-helps-people-without-without-diabetes-lose-1325-body-weight-weight-weight-in-real-real-real-world-world-worldstudy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d80cf832-4d3d-45b6-b509-05b966651ec Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:30:00 -0400 Tirzepatide helps people without diabetes lose 13% body weight in real-world study
急诊室停机时间可以增加宫颈癌的筛查，研究表明罗切斯特大学医学中心的一项研究表明，急诊室的停机时间可能会在宫颈癌筛查落后的女性中有潜在的上升空间，这是一个全国性的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/emergency-room-downtime-can-boost-cervical-cancer-cancer-cancer-screenings-screenings-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/emergency-room-downtime-can-boost-cervical-cancer-cancer-cancer-screenings-screenings-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1095EF89-DABB-4DDF-8439-B3145DCBA658 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:27:37 -0400 Emergency room downtime can boost cervical cancer screenings, study shows
3D成像阐明了头骨中的神经和血管随着年龄的增长而下降随着身体的年龄，骨骼发生变化，可能会阻碍其再生和愈合的能力。尽管先前的研究集中在骨组织本身的结构转移上，但神经和血管的作用（骨骼健康中的临界参与者）仍然相对尚未探索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/3d-imaging-sheds-light-on-how-nenves-and-nerves-and-blood-blood-vessels-in-the-skull-decline-decline-decline-with-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/3d-imaging-sheds-light-now-now-norves-how-nerves-and-blood-werood-vessels-in-the-skull-decline-decline-decline-with-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A733109-9A74-4984-9CB2-298005F11A22 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:18:00 -0400 3D imaging sheds light on how nerves and blood vessels in the skull decline with age
研究确定了频繁献血者的血液干细胞的遗传变化弗朗西斯·克里克学院（Francis Crick Institute）的研究人员已经从经常献血者的血管细胞中确定了支持新的非癌细胞产生的血液干细胞的遗传变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-Identifies-genetic-chentic-changes-inblood-stem-cells-cells-cells-frequence-frequence-frequent-frequent-blood-donors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-Identifies-genetic-genetic-changes-inblood-sum-stem-cells-frequence-frequend-frequence-blood-donors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2BC3D759-1835-4C0C-8BA8-21E9218EFC3F Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:13:58 -0400 Study identifies genetic changes in blood stem cells of frequent blood donors
研究探讨了奖励处理和执行功能如何随着年龄的增长而发展的大脑网络许多精神疾病与大脑网络的功能发生了变化，这些功能可以推动奖励处理和执行功能，例如做出决策，采取风险，计划和记忆力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-explores-how-brain-networks-for-reward-processing-and-processing-and-decessing-deccuntioning-devolding-velveve-vovel-vovel-vith--gith-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-explores-how-brain-networks-for-reward-processing-and-processing-and-compessing-and-cecessing-deccuntioning-devolve-vovellove-vith-evolve-with-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6db0130-432c-432c-43e3-bfaa-cf1df1df790efa0 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:04:19 -0400 Study explores how brain networks for reward processing and executive functioning evolve with age
研究发现医疗补助扩张与阿片类药物滥用之间没有联系一项新的研究发现，扩大国家医疗补助覆盖范围并没有增加使用药物的人中处方阿片类药物或苯二氮卓类药物的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-finds-no-no-link-bet-medicaid-expansion-expansion-and-popioid-misuse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-finds-no-no-link-bet-medicaid-expansion-expansion-and-opioid-misuse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8499529c-d6ed-40AD-9138-1ACF67B727D5 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 21:53:15 -0400 Study finds no link between Medicaid expansion and opioid misuse
